item.title: My First Hugo Theme
item.description: When I started to get back to blogging, I felt my website took a little long to compile. As a revolution of redesigning my blog, I want to switch my blog platform to something faster.

item.title: Learning to See
item.description: People asked me why I had a computer science degree but spending most of my time working as user experience developer. Here is the article that hooked me into it:
